Name: Attack (Melee)
Description: Attack an enemy with a melee weapon

Name: Attack (Range)
Description: Attack an enemy with a ranged weapon

Name: Magic Bolt
Description: Attack an enemy with a Magic bolt

Name: Fire Sword
Description: Attacks an enemy with a fire sword

Name: Blood Transfusion
Description: Passes 25% of remaining HP to an Ally

Name: Sacrifice
Description: Heals all allies to full by sacrificing life
